# PR Template Guide

Use the template matching your PR intent:
- `feature.md`: new capabilities and user-facing behavior additions
- `bugfix.md`: defect fixes with reproduction + validation
- `refactor-chore.md`: internal cleanup, tooling, or non-functional changes
- `docs.md`: documentation-only updates
- `release-hotfix.md`: urgent production fix or release-critical changes
- `solo-self-review.md`: single-maintainer workflow with explicit self-review evidence

If uncertain, use `.github/PULL_REQUEST_TEMPLATE.md` (general template).
